Header: Discussions in the cabinet for not arresting Shiranthi Rajapaksa; a revelation from JVP leader
Content: JVP leader MP Anura Kumara Dissanayake said that the cabinet in its discussion deliberated not to arrest former President Mahinda Rajapaksaâ€™s wife Shiranti Rajapaksa. The JVP leader said this whilst participating at a media briefing held in Colombo yesterday.
